metadata.title: CVE-2024-26668 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_limit: reject configurations that cause integer overflowReject bogus configs where internal token counter wraps around.This only occurs with very very large requests, such as 17gbyte/s.Its better to reject this rather than having incorrect ratelimit.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
